text: Kare-ra wa odoroite itta. `Suruto hontoni anata wa, yusufuna nodesu ka.' Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa yusufudesu. Kore wa watashi no ototodesu. Arra wa tashika ni watashi-tachi ni megumi fukaku ara reru. Hontoni omo o osore, ken'nindearunaraba, arra wa kesshite zenko no to e no hosho o, munashiku nasa renai
